long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows the playing handicaps of a selected booking on a MiClub tee-sheet, or a free filled text field. 

V3 - upgraded to Manifest v3.0
   - prints a bagstore sheet
   - counts members and visitor on sheet (including those selected)
   - Calculates daily handicaps
